ACSEL.IS.long_name: Aciselsan Acipayam Seluloz Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
ACSEL.IS.summary: Aciselsan Acipayam Seluloz Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells carboxymethylcellulose (CMC) in Turkey. The company also engages in import, export, and trading of various chemicals. Its CMC is used in powders and cream detergents, paints, wallpaper adhesives, textiles, foods, oil drilling, ceramics, pharmaceuticals, and cosmetics, as well as in welding rods. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Denizli, Turkey.

AFYON.IS.long_name: Afyon Çimento Sanayi Türk Anonim Sirketi
AFYON.IS.summary: Afyon Ãimento Sanayi TÃ¼rk Anonim Sirketi produces and sells cement. It offers Portland cement and Portland composite cement to the construction industry. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Afyon Ãimento Sanayi TÃ¼rk Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Cimsa Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi.

AKCNS.IS.long_name: Akçansa Çimento Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
AKCNS.IS.summary: AkÃ§ansa Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cement, clinker, ready-mix concrete, and aggregates in Turkey and internationally. The company operates through Cement and Ready Mix Concrete segments. It offers products under the Agregasa brand name. The company also provides port and technical support services. It sells its products online. AkÃ§ansa Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ALKA.IS.long_name: Alkim Kagit Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
ALKA.IS.summary: Alkim Kagit Sanayi ve Ticaret AS manufactures and sells woodfree offset, coated, office, and special papers primarily in Turkey. Its woodfree offset papers include, offset white writing and printing papers, and copy quality offset white writing and printing papers; coated papers comprise glossy, matt, and one side coated papers, as well as label papers; and special papers include envelope, blueprint, drawing, map, optical reader, kraft shopping bag, ivory, chamois, white kraft, and wall papers. It also exports its products to 32 countries. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Alkim Kagit Sanayi ve Ticaret AS is a subsidiary of Alkim Alkali Kimya AS.

ALKIM.IS.summary: Alkim Alkali Kimya A.S. produces and sells paper products in Turkey and internationally. It operates through three segments: Chemical Products, Paper, and Other. The company produces and distributes various chemical materials. It offers sodium sulphate for use in detergent, glass, pulp and paper, and textile products, as well as in the production of various chemicals, including potassium sulfate, aluminum sulfate, sodium silicate, and sodium sulphur; salts for use in food, textile, de-icing, leather, chemistry, health, and animal feed industries; leonite fertilizers; and magnesium compounds, such as magnesium chloride and magnesium sulfate. The company also operates chrome mine, which covers an area of 1,200 hectares located in Eskisehir region; produces paper products, such as offset, coated, office, glossy, and photocopy papers, as well as paper pulp; and offers insurance brokerage services, as well as produces and sells electricity and heat energy. Alkim Alkali Kimya A.S. was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AYES.IS.long_name: Ayes Celik Hasir Ve Cit Sanayi A.S.
AYES.IS.summary: Ayes Celik Hasir Ve Cit Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells wire meshes in Turkey. The company provides Q type and R type wire meshes, fence meshes, and welded and special wire meshes; and coil bar-wire rods, cutted deformed bars, stirrup rebars, and steel rebars. It also offers drawing, wire cutting, butt welding, and mesh bending machines; panel fences; and reinforcement stands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

BAGFS.IS.summary: Bagfas Bandirma Gubre Fabrikalari A.S. produces and sells fertilizers in Turkey. It offers chemical fertilizers, which include ammonium nitrate; calcium ammonium nitrate; di ammonium phosphate; AS, sulphur, and sulphur zinc composite fertilizer; sulphur trioxide zinc NPK compound; and special formulations. The company also provides phosphoric and sulfuric acids; and other specialty products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

BASCM.IS.long_name: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BASCM.IS.summary: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells cement, clinker, aggregate, ready-mixed concrete, and lime products in Turkey. The Company was founded in 1967 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Parficim S.A.

BRSAN.IS.long_name: Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BRSAN.IS.summary: Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells steel pipes in Turkey. The company offers ERW line pipes, spirally welded line pipes, boiler tubes, pressure purpose tubes, casing and tubing products, and natural gas pipes for the energy market. It also provides water pipes, sprinkle pipes, SRM pipes, spirally welded water line pipes, and water well casing pipes; and circular hollow section and self-anchor pipes, and foundation/piling tubes for use in construction. In addition, the company offers automotive tubes; hydraulic cylinder tubes; welded cold and drawn tubes; and steel profiles for the use in various sectors, such as automotive, construction, agricultural machinery, towel rails, furniture, etc. It also exports its products to various countries in the United States, Europe, Africa, and Asia. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Borusan Mannesmann Boru Yatirim Holding A.S.

BRYAT.IS.summary: Borusan Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S. invests in companies operating in steel, distributorship, logistics, and technology sectors. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BSOKE.IS.summary: BatisÃ¶ke SÃ¶ke Ãimento Sanayii T.A.S. produces and sells cement and clinker products in Turkey. Its products include Portland cement clinker and Portland cement, as well as aggregates. BATISÃKE SÃ¶ke Ãimento Sanayii T.A.S. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

BTCIM.IS.long_name: Batiçim Bati Anadolu Çimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
BTCIM.IS.summary: BatiÃ§im Bati Anadolu Ãimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi operates in the cement industry in Turkey. It offers Portland cement clinkers and potassium silicate cements; Portland, sulphate resistant Portland, Portland compound, and pozzolanic cements; and aggregate and cement bypass dust products. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

BUCIM.IS.summary: Bursa Cimento Fabrikasi A.S. produces and sells cement and clinker products in Turkey. The company offers Portland, Portland composite, and pozzolanic cement. It also exports its products to Russia, Azerbaijan, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Albania, Portugal, Romania, Greece, Libia, Egypt, Algeria, Sudan, Nigeria, Gambia, Cape Verde, Ghana, and Cyprus. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

CEMTS.IS.long_name: Çemtas Çelik Makina Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
CEMTS.IS.summary: Ãemtas Ãelik Makina Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of steel products in Turkey. The company offers carbon, structural, case hardening, spring, microalloyed, free-cutting, stainless, boron, and carbon tool and bearing steels, as well as steels for quenching and tempering. It also provides spring steel flat, peeled round, and stabilizer bar sections. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. Ãemtas Ãelik Makina Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Bursa Cimento Fabrikasi A.S.

CIMSA.IS.long_name: Çimsa Çimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
CIMSA.IS.summary: Ãimsa Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells cement, clinker, and ready-mix concrete in Turkey. The company's products include gray, white, and calcium aluminate cement; and standard and special ready-mixed concrete. It also provides financial investment services. The company exports its products to approximately 65 countries primarily in the Middle East, Europe, North Africa, and the United States. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ãimsa Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S.

CMBTN.IS.long_name: Cimbeton Hazir Beton ve Prefabrik Yapi Elemanlari Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
CMBTN.IS.summary: Cimbeton Hazir Beton ve Prefabrik Yapi Elemanlari Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces, distributes, and sells ready-mixed concrete in Turkey. The company offers self-compacting, light-weight, coloured, fibrous, high-strength, permeable, and lean concrete products, as well as ready-mix wet plaster, alum, and shotcrete. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Cimbeton Hazir Beton ve Prefabrik Yapi Elemanlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Cimentas Izmir Cimento Fabrikasi Turk A.S.

CMENT.IS.long_name: Çimentas Izmir Çimento Fabrikasi Türk A.S.
CMENT.IS.summary: Ãimentas Izmir Ãimento Fabrikasi TÃ¼rk A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells cement, and ready mix concrete in Turkey and internationally. The company is also engaged in fuel sales, fly ash, and waste management businesses. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Ãimentas Izmir Ãimento Fabrikasi TÃ¼rk A.S. is a subsidiary of Aalborg Portland EspaÃ±a S.L.

DNISI.IS.long_name: Dinamik Isi Makina Yalitim Malzemeleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
DNISI.IS.summary: Dinamik Isi Makina Yalitim Malzemeleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture and sale of insulation, HVAC, packaging, industrial foam, and furniture forming products in Turkey. Its insulation products includes thermal insulation, NPE-polyethylene, rubber, crosslinked polyethylene sheet, valve jacket, glass wool, acoustic and sound insulation, and auxiliary products; HVAC products, such as ventilation element, fan, flexible air duct, Anemostat and Louver connector, and flow adjustment damper; and packaging products, including packaging profile, corner protector, mattress, sheet, special design, and entertainment and sports products. The company also provides industrial foam products, which include foam tapes and special cut products; and furniture foaming products comprising of high and low density flooring profiles, and high density flooring wicks. Dinamik Isi Makina Yalitim Malzemeleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

DYOBY.IS.long_name: DYO Boya Fabrikalari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DYOBY.IS.summary: Dyo Boya Fabrikalari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells paints in Turkey. The company offers construction, thermal insulation, furniture coatings, marine coatings, dyotransocean coatings, coil coatings, industrial coatings, polyester, defense industry coatings, automotive repair coatings, and powder coatings. It also provides varnishes, resins, construction chemicals, and various paint application equipment. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. DYO Boya Fabrikalari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

EGGUB.IS.summary: Ege GÃ¼bre Sanayii A.S. produces and sells fertilizers in Turkey. The company offers compound fertilizers and organic solvents. It also provides various port services, including pier loading, unloading, and storage services, as well as operates tank farm facilities that provide petroleum products storage services. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

EREGL.IS.long_name: Eregli Demir ve Çelik Fabrikalari T.A.S.
EREGL.IS.summary: Eregli Demir ve Ãelik Fabrikalari T.A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells iron and steel rolled products, alloyed and non-alloyed iron, steel and pig iron castings, cast and pressed products, coke, and by-products in Turkey and internationally. The company's flat products include hot rolled flat steel products, cold-rolled flat steel products, and galvanized/galvanealed flat steel products; and tin/chrome coated flat steel products used in metal packaging industry. It also provides various byproducts, including motor benzole, pure benzole, toluol, xylol, crude tar, ammonium sulphate, iron sulphate, and granulated high furnace slag. In addition, the company offers port services, such as loading and unloading, maritime, third party, warehouse, liquid and solid waste collection, maritime police, and customs and customs enforcement services. It primarily serves automotive, white goods, construction, pipes and tubes, rolling, general machinery and manufacturing, household appliance, heat and pressure vessel equipment, electrics-electronics, mechanical engineering, energy, shipbuilding, defense, and packaging industries. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ERELY.long_name: Eregli Demir ve Çelik Fabrikalari T.A.S.
ERELY.summary: Eregli Demir ve Ãelik Fabrikalari T.A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells iron and steel rolled products, alloyed and non-alloyed iron, steel and pig iron castings, cast and pressed products, coke, and by-products in Turkey and internationally. The company's flat products include hot rolled flat steel products, cold-rolled flat steel products, and galvanized/galvanealed flat steel products; and tin/chrome coated flat steel products used in metal packaging industry. It also provides various byproducts, including motor benzole, pure benzole, toluol, xylol, crude tar, ammonium sulphate, iron sulphate, and granulated high furnace slag. In addition, the company offers port services, such as loading and unloading, maritime, third party, warehouse, liquid and solid waste collection, maritime police, and customs and customs enforcement services. It primarily serves automotive, white goods, construction, pipes and tubes, rolling, general machinery and manufacturing, household appliance, heat and pressure vessel equipment, electrics-electronics, mechanical engineering, energy, shipbuilding, defense, and packaging industries. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GEDZA.IS.long_name: Gediz Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GEDZA.IS.summary: Gediz Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells corrugated polypropylene (PP) sheets in Europe. Its PP sheets are used in various applications, such as separators, white appliances and electronics, automotive products, logistic products, iron works, stationary products, project bags, magazine boxes, archive boxes, vegetable fruit boxes, multipurpose boxes, recycling bins, signboards and stands, agricultural products, flower boxes, pet kennels, beehives, greenhouses, sapling shield products, and building and isolation products. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Gediz, Turkey.

GOLTS.IS.long_name: Göltas Göller Bölgesi Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GOLTS.IS.summary: GÃ¶ltas GÃ¶ller BÃ¶lgesi Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and markets clinker, cement, and plant mixed concrete in Turkey. The company offers Portland cement, Portland composite cement, Pozzolanic cement, and sulfate resistant cement. It also provides raw materials and semi-finished products, including gypsum, trass, limestone, marn, iron ore, and bauxite; and Portland cement clinker, as well as SR 5 clinker products. The company exports its products to 43 countries. GÃ¶ltas GÃ¶ller BÃ¶lgesi Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GUBRF.IS.summary: GÃ¼bre Fabrikalari TÃ¼rk Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets chemical fertilizers in Turkey. The company's products include solid, water soluble, slow release, and organic farming fertilizers; and plant growth regulators and soil conditioners, as well as plant protection products. It also produces and trades in fertilizer raw materials; and provides ports services to third parties for the loading and unloading of dry, liquid, and general cargoes. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. GÃ¼bre Fabrikalari TÃ¼rk Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Tarim Kredi Kooperatifleri Merkez Birligi

HEKTS.IS.summary: Hektas Ticaret T.A.S. manufactures and markets agricultural chemicals and veterinary pharmaceuticals primarily in Turkey. Its crop protection products include fungicides, herbicides, insecticides, acaricides, fumigants, nematicides and soil fumigants, plant growth regulators, winter spray pesticides and summer oils, and molluscicides and other products. The company also offers corn and sunflowers seeds, organomineral, chemical, feed additive, and public health products. It distributes its products through a network of approximately 1,500 point of sales and dealers. The company also exports its products to the Middle Eastern and Central Asian Countries, the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, the C.I.S. countries, and the Balkan Countries. Hektas Ticaret T.A.S. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.

ISDMR.IS.summary: Iskenderun Demir ve Ãelik A.S. produces and sells iron and steel products in Turkey. The company offers hot-rolled flat steel products, such as rolls or sheet metals, and plates. It also provides various billets, such as steel for production of patterned reinforcing bars, structural steel for production of angle bars and profiles, steel for production of structural steel shapes for vessels, and chromium-alloys and high-carbon steel for the automotive industry; and coils. In addition, it offers byproducts, including motor and pure benzol, toluol, xylol, raw tar, ammonium sulfate, iron sulfate, and granulated blast furnace slag; and coke, oxygen, nitrogen, and argon. Further, the company provides training and laboratory services; and port services, including maritime, customs, and security services. It also exports its products to Southern Europe and Middle Eastern countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Hatay, Turkey. Iskenderun Demir ve Ãelik A.S. is a subsidiary of Eregli Demir ve Ãelik Fabrikalari T.A.S.

IZMDC.IS.long_name: Izmir Demir Çelik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
IZMDC.IS.summary: Izmir Demir Ãelik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells steel in Turkey and internationally. It offers semi-finished products, and sections and profiles. The company also invests in power plant and maritime businesses. It owns and operates three ships totaling 153,000 DWT. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Izmir Demir Ãelik Sanayi Anonim Sirket is a subsidiary of Sahin Â KoÃ§ Ãelik Sanayi A.S.

KONYA.IS.summary: Konya Ãimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells cement, clinker, and ready mixed concrete in Central Anatolia and the Mediterranean Region. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Konya, Turkey. Konya Ãimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Parficim S.A.S.

KOZAA.IS.long_name: Koza Anadolu Metal Madencilik Isletmeleri A.S.
KOZAA.IS.summary: Koza Anadolu Metal Madencilik Isletmeleri A.S. operates in the mining sector in Turkey. The company explores for, develops, and produces copper, lead-zinc, iron, and other mineral deposits. It holds interests in the Balikesir Sagirlar Project, Nigde Ciftehan Project, Nigde Elmali Project, Giresun Konak Project, and Batman Sason Project. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey. Koza Anadolu Metal Madencilik Isletmeleri AS is a subsidiary of Ipek Dogal Enerji Kaynaklari Arastirma ve Uretim A.S.

KOZAL.IS.summary: Koza Altin Isletmeleri A.S. explores and operates gold mines in Turkey. It owns interests in the Ovacik, Mastra, Cukuralan Kaymaz, Himmetdede, Coraklik, and Kubaslar gold mines, as well as Mollakara project. The company is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

KRDMA.IS.long_name: Kardemir Karabük Demir Çelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
KRDMA.IS.summary: Kardemir KarabÃ¼k Demir Ãelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells iron and steel products in Turkey. It offers wire rods, railway rails and wheels, profiles, rebars, round bars, billets, equal and unequal angles, GI and TH sections for mine support, platinas, blooms, pig iron products, coke products, granule blast furnace slag, and air separation plant's products, as well as metallurgical lime. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in KarabÃ¼k, Turkey.

KRDMB.IS.long_name: Kardemir Karabük Demir Çelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
KRDMB.IS.summary: Kardemir KarabÃ¼k Demir Ãelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells iron and steel products in Turkey. It offers wire rods, railway rails and wheels, profiles, rebars, round bars, billets, equal and unequal angles, GI and TH sections for mine support, platinas, blooms, pig iron products, coke products, granule blast furnace slag, and air separation plant's products, as well as metallurgical lime. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in KarabÃ¼k, Turkey.

KRDMD.IS.long_name: Kardemir Karabük Demir Çelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
KRDMD.IS.summary: Kardemir KarabÃ¼k Demir Ãelik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells iron and steel products in Turkey. It offers wire rods, railway rails and wheels, profiles, rebars, round bars, billets, equal and unequal angles, GI and TH sections for mine support, platinas, blooms, pig iron products, coke products, granule blast furnace slag, and air separation plant's products, as well as metallurgical lime. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in KarabÃ¼k, Turkey.

MEGAP.IS.long_name: Mega Polietilen Köpük Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
MEGAP.IS.summary: Mega Polietilen KÃ¶pÃ¼k Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells foam sheets in Turkey. It offers polyethylene, EVA, and EPDM rubber foams for automotive, white good, construction and insulation, packaging, shoe and slipper, textile and bag, sports, marine and yacht, and orthopedic sectors. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MRSHL.IS.long_name: Marshall Boya Ve Vernik Sanayii A.S.
MRSHL.IS.summary: Marshall Boya Ve Vernik Sanayii A.S. operates as a paints and coatings company in Turkey. It also offers manufacturing industrial, specialty, and other chemicals; and petrol rubber and plastic products, as well as polyester, acrylic, and vinyl polymer based paints and varnishes. The company offers its products through dealers and stores. Marshall Boya Ve Vernik Sanayii A.S. was incorporated in 1965 and is headquartered in Dilovasi, Turkey.

NUHCM.IS.summary: Nuh Ãimento Sanayi A.S. produces and sells cement, clinker, and mineral additives in Turkey and internationally. It offers ready-mixed concrete products, and lime and gas concrete products; and port services, including cargo handling services. In addition, the company engages in the construction and contracting works; and extraction, loading, and shipping agency activities. It offers its products through a dealer network and direct sales system. The company also exports its products primarily to Western Europe. Nuh Ãimento Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

OYAKC.IS.summary: OYAK Ãimento Fabrikalari A.S. produces and sells clinker and cement in Turkey. It offers portland, white portland, portland composite, white portland limestone, blast furnace slag, pozzolanic, sulphate resistant pozzolanic and portland, and composite cement products, as well as Api well, and other special cements. The company also provides fly ash, ready-mixed concrete, kraft paper, and paper bag. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Mardin Ãimento Sanayii ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to OYAK Ãimento Fabrikalari A.S. in May 2020. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. OYAK Ãimento Fabrikalari A.S. is a subsidiary of OYAK Ãimento A.S.

OZBAL.IS.long_name: Ozbal Celik Boru Sanayi Ticaret ve Taahhut Anonim Sirketi
OZBAL.IS.summary: Ozbal Celik Boru Sanayi Ticaret ve Taahhut Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells spiral welded steel pipes in Turkey. The company's steel pipes are used in various areas, including oil pipe lines, gas distribution lines, water distribution lines, foundation stakes, industrial pipe networks, steel structures, pressurized air lines, conveying liquid hydrocarbon in refineries, conveying high temperature water, and storing applications for hydrocarbons. It also provides spiral welded pipes that are used in natural gas, oil and water pipe lines, ports, pile pipe lines, and general purposes. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Mersin, Turkey. Ozbal Celik Boru Sanayi Ticaret ve Taahhut Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Erciyas Holding A.S.

PETKM.IS.summary: Petkim Petrokimya Holding Anonim Sirketi produces and sells petrochemical products in Turkey and internationally. The company offers thermoplastics, such as low density polyethylene, high density polyethylene, polypropylene, and polyvinyl chloride; fiber raw materials, including acrylonitrile, mono-ethylene glycol, and pure terephthalic acid; aromatics, such as benzene, paraxylene, orthoxylene, and toluene; olefins comprising polymer and chemical grade propylene, and ethylene; and other products, such as crude C4, C5 mixture, aromatic oil, pyrolysis gasoline, diethyleneglycol, sodiumhydroxide, and phthalic anhydride. Its products are used in the plastics, chemicals, packaging, piping, paint, construction, agriculture, automotive, electricity, electronics, and textiles, as well as pharmaceuticals, detergents, and cosmetics sectors. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Petkim Petrokimya Holding A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Socar Turkey Petrokimya AS.

POLHO.IS.summary: Polisan Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells chemical materials in Turkey. The company offers formaldehyde, formaldehyde resins, construction chemicals, and AUS 32; polyethylene terephthalate granules and preforms; paints; and bulk liquid storage, general warehouse, and loading and unloading services for dry bulk and general cargo vessels. It also provides polyethylene terephthalate resin and preform products for use in beverage, water, food, drink, and food containers, as well as in synthetic fibers. In addition, the company engages in the construction of water channels, roads, bridges, dams, sewers, and infrastructure facilities; trading and manufacturing of construction and installation materials; and organizing domestic and overseas trips for tourism, occupation, and education purposes. Polisan Holding A.S. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Dilovasi, Turkey.

POLTK.IS.long_name: Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
POLTK.IS.summary: Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells aluminum surface treatment chemicals in Turkey. The company offers anodizing chemicals and powder coating pretreatment chemicals. It also provides engineering, design, and consultancy services for anodizing lines; and anodizing plant accessories, including jig holders, jigs, plastic clamps, plastic pliers, and sealing balls, as well as undertakes turn-key anodizing projects. In addition, the company offers anodizing plant equipment, such as acid recovery systems, acid pumps, waste water treatment systems, blowers, chiller and cooling towers, anodizing rectifiers and tanks, anodizing cranes, filter pumps and presses, exhaustion and automatic systems, automatic chemical dosing systems, plate heat exchangers, pneumatic clamping devices, electro coloring transformers, hot water and steam boilers, cooling skids, water conditioning systems, and loading and unloading lifts. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PRKME.IS.long_name: Park Elektrik Üretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PRKME.IS.summary: Park Elektrik Ãretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., through its subsidiary, Konya Ilgin Elektrik Ãretim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., generates and sells electricity in Turkey. It focuses on establishing a thermal power plant with an installed capacity of 500MW in the Ilgin District of Konya. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Park Elektrik Ãretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Park Holding A.S.

SARKY.IS.long_name: Sarkuysan Elektrolitik Bakir Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SARKY.IS.summary: Sarkuysan Elektrolitik Bakir Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in electrolytic copper wire, copper, and copper alloys in Turkey. It offers electrolytic copper cathode products; oxygen free and ETP wire rods; DHP and ETP copper billets; bare, tin plated, and nickel plated copper single wires; bare and tin plated, and nickel plated multi wires, as well as bare and tin plated multi wires on braider bobbins; and bare, tin plated, and nickel plated bunched conductors. The company also provides flat wires and profiles, and PV ribbon wires; copper and copper alloy contact wires, and stranded copper and copper alloy conductors; copper tubes and busbars; and copper nuggets. In addition, it manufactures, imports, and exports steel spool packaging materials and machineries; and offers marketing and distribution services, as well as rents properties. The company's products are used in various industries, including electro technique, electronic, motor, communication, power generation and distribution, solar and renewable energy, home appliances, measurement instruments, defense, automotive, chemical, construction, heating, air-conditioning, and sanitary plumbing. It also exports its products to approximately 70 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Darica, Turkey.

SISE.IS.long_name: Türkiye Sise Ve Cam Fabrikalari A.S.
SISE.IS.summary: TÃ¼rkiye Sise Ve Cam Fabrikalari A.S. manufactures and sells glass products worldwide. It operates through five segments: Flat Glass, Glassware, Glass Packaging, Chemicals, and Others. The company offers architectural glass products, such as flat, patterned, mirror, laminated, coated, solar power, and white goods glass products; automotive glass products; energy glass products; and home appliance glass products. It also designs, produces, and sells glassware; retails glass, ceramic, porcelain, and wood and steel tableware and kitchenware, and home decoration items under the Life and Boutique concepts through 51 PasabahÃ§e stores located in Turkey and international markets, as well as through online sales channels; and produces and sells glass packaging products for various industries, including food, beverages, pharmaceuticals, and cosmetics. In addition, the company produces and sells soda ash and chromium chemicals, glass fiber, raw materials, vitamin K3 derivatives, sodium dichromate, basic chromium sulfate, and sodium metabisulfite to detergents, chemical, leather, pharmaceuticals, food, textiles, mining, water treatment, and construction chemical industries; automotive and encapsulated glasses; and glasses for light and heavy-duty commercial vehicles. Further, it is involved in the production and sale of industrial raw materials; mining of silica sand, feldspar, limestone, dolomite, kaolin, and quartzite; generation and sale of electricity; trading, purchasing, selling, wholesaling, importing, exporting, and storing of compressed natural gas and liquefied natural gas; glass recycling and waste collection activities; and trading of soda goods, as well as offers finance and investment, and insurance agency services. The company was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. TÃ¼rkiye Sise Ve Cam Fabrikalari A.S. is a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Is Bankasi A.S.

SODSN.IS.summary: Sodas Sodyum Sanayii A.S. produces and sells chemicals in Turkey. The company offers natural sodium sulphate for use in detergent, glass, paper, fertilizer, chemical, and textile industries; and sodium chloride (salt). Sodas Sodyum Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

SUMAS.IS.long_name: Sumas Suni Tahta ve Mobilya Sanayi A.S.
SUMAS.IS.summary: Sumas Suni Tahta ve Mobilya Sanayi A.S. produces and sells chipboards in Turkey. The company offers OSB resistant sheets, chipboards, and fire resistant boards. Its products are used in various applications, including roof covering, shingle plate, floor covering, and combined and single applications; vehicle body manufacturing; interior decoration and packaging applications; in store, shop construction and decoration, and Baraka and prefabricated buildings interior parts; construction of warehouses, stages, gyms, and schools; construction of moisture resistant, flat, and insulated surfaces; carrier floors, walls, and partition structures; and wall coverings. Sumas Suni Tahta ve Mobilya Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1978 and is based in Balikesir, Turkey.

TMPOL.IS.long_name: Temapol Polimer Plastik ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
TMPOL.IS.summary: Temapol Polimer Plastik ve Insaat Sanayi Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells thermoplastic sheets in Turkey and internationally. The company's products are used in furniture, sanitary ware, automotive and vehicle, white goods and cooling, advertisement, and medical and sanitary industries. It also offers temaglass and high gloss acrylic sheets. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

UZERB.IS.long_name: Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S.
UZERB.IS.summary: Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S. operates in the paint industry in Turkey. It provides paints, varnishes, water repellent products, color enhancers, floor protectors, wallpaper glues, paint covers, silicones, sandpapers, and brush and roller products, as well as concrete and wood floor and surface cleaners. The company also offers iron oxide powder paints, sanders, protective covers, insulation materials, marine and yacht paints, antifouling paints, gilding paints, wallpaper adhesives, optima glue, technological paint application systems, construction paints, and isolation materials. It markets and sells its products under the Beeck, Beeck SP Plus, Bondex, Pozzi-Colors, Nu-Guard AG, Incralac, and Aries brands. The company was formerly known as Uzer Koll. Sti. and changed its name to Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim Anonim Sirketi in 1972. Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S. was founded in 1962 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

YBTAS.IS.long_name: Yibitas Yozgat Isçi Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
YBTAS.IS.summary: Yibitas Yozgat IsÃ§i Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells cement. It also offers ready mixed concrete and clinker products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in YerkÃ¶y, Turkey. Yibitas Yozgat IsÃ§i Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Votorantim Ãimento Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.

YKSLN.IS.summary: Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells iron and steel products in Turkey, Europe, the Middle East, and North Africa. The company offers carbon, manufacturing, structural, alloy and mon-alloy, tooling stainless, skilled, and unskilled iron and steel products under the DSS, POLDI, TOOLGO, WESS, YÃKSELEN, and ETE brands for use in various industries, including machinery, automotive, formwork, iron and steel, ship, construction, and railway industries. Its products include round steel, flat and square, sheets and plates, hexagon and bright, pipes, special grade products, and forgings. The also imports, exports, buys, and sells iron and steel products. The company was formerly known as Yukselen Celik Ticaret Limited Sirketi and changed its name to Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi in January 2013. Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
